title: WAR is Confusing to Me, Still
description:
Tim Kurkjian and Buster discuss Ozzie Albies breaking his foot, the Braves’ 12-game winning streak, Buster previously declaring the NL East over, the Padres moving into a tie with the Dodgers in the NL West, why Alek Manoah is like a position player, the Cardinals following Paul Goldschmidt’s lead, José Ramírez’s season so far, Tony La Russa explaining his decision to walk Trea Turner, if the Angelos family feud could restrict the Orioles’ spending and Mike Trout on the mic during Sunday Night Baseball. Then, Sarah Langs plays The Numbers Game with notes on Matt Carpenter, Joe Musgrove, the wins streaks in the NL East and Byron Buxton. Plus, highlights from Trouts’ night on the mic, and Phil Nevin with Mike Couzens.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
